text: Extreme Rules (2013) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by WWE. It was held on May 19, 2013 at the Scottrade Center in St. Louis, Missouri. It was the fifth Extreme Rules event held by the WWE. ==Matches== # Matches Stipulations Times Pre-show The Miz defeated Cody Rhodes by submission Singles match 9:09 1 Chris Jericho defeated Fandango (with Summer Rae) Singles match 8:34 2 Dean Ambrose defeated Kofi Kingston (c) Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 6:47 3 Sheamus defeated Mark Henry Strap match 7:57 4 Alberto Del Rio (with Ricardo Rodriguez) defeated Jack Swagger (with Zeb Colter) "I Quit" match to determine the number one contender to the World Heavyweight Championship 11:17 5 The Shield (Seth Rollins and Roman Reigns) defeated Team Hell No (Daniel Bryan and Kane) (c) Tornado tag team match for the WWE Tag Team Championship 7:22 6 Randy Orton defeated Big Show Extreme Rules match 13:00 7 John Cena (c) vs. Ryback ended in a no contest Last Man Standing match for the WWE Championship 23:00 8 Brock Lesnar (with Paul Heyman) defeated Triple H Steel cage match 20:07 (c) â€“ refers to the champion(s) heading into the match ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Extreme Rules 2013 website Category:2013 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in St. Louis, Missouri Category:WWE Extreme Rules Category:2013 in the United States Category:2010s in St. Louis, Missouri
title: Extreme Rules (2013)
